front.title: Session Peering Provisioning (SPP) Protocol over REST

abstract.t: The Session Peering Provisioning Framework (SPPF) is an XML framework that exists to enable the provisioning of session establishment data into Session Data Registries or SIP Service Provider data stores. This SPP Protocol implementation follows the REST style widely used today in ditributed systems. The benefits include scalibility of the interactions between the involved components, ... This document describes the specification for performing SPPF operations over REST/ HTTP.
